Work History

Self Improvement Era

Self Improvement Period

Jul 2023 - Present

Paused my professional career to develop myself as a more well-rounded individual

  • Built custom Smart Home applications locally hosted on Raspberry Pi such as BeautifulSoup and Flask
  • Learned video production techniques and design using Davinci Resolve to develop informative and entertaining video essays
  • Refined my writing skills through journaling

Team Lead Era

Engineering Team Lead | 8x8

Jan 2022 - Jun 2023

Worked with team through an acquisition to start development on a greenfield Contact Center scripting engine

  • Integrated team into a new company-wide project management methodologies
  • Categorized and analyzed pre-existing voice architecture
  • Road-mapped new Contact Center system using modern cloud infrastructure
  • Developed Java-based prototype application as proof-of-concept of initial phase

Team Lead - Core Voice Services | Fuze

Jul 2021 - Jan 2022

Led team to develop a modern, elastic voice infrastructure powered by AWS and using a modern CI/CD pipeline

  • Served product manager role to strategicially define scope of releases
  • Engaged with downstream services to provide enablement on changes
  • Acted as point of escalation and SME for company's critical voice infrastructure and largest product segment
  • Presented to executive-level stakeholders on product development progress

UC Engineer Era

UC Engineer | Fuze

Jan 2021 - Jun 2021

Maintained the existing voice processing infrastructure while extending it with API abstraction and Java apps

  • Designed and developed new microservice architecture and API feature sets
  • Developed user experience requirements to ensure valueable customer experiences
  • Maintained call routing paths encompassing global customer base
  • Developed internal product documentation to increase understanding of product vision and functions

Support Engineer Era

Staff Engineer | Fuze

Jan 2017 - Dec 2020

Interfaced with internal development teams to resolve critical escalations and provide enablement for the rest of the Support Organization

  • Triaged and investigated critical escalations while coordinating cross-team efforts to resolution
  • Served as Subject Matter Expert for critical voice infrastructure to ensure data integrity and optimal service performance
  • Developed and led enablement initiatives to enhance the overall skillset of the Support Organization

Support Engineer & Lead - Enterprise | Fuze

May 2014 - Dec 2016

Led team of Support Engineers to quickly and carefully resolve issues of our largest customer bases

  • Developed enablement strategies to achieve improved customer experiences with product and services
  • Tracked customer satisfaction and developed action plans to address customer health issues
